posts.post_title: FS: T212-1 1909 Obaks Collector Grade and Cheap! Prices Reduced!

Both Brackenridge horizontals, Speas, and Haley either unavailable or sold. Everything else, including 2 nice Bernard Obaks, are left:

Bernard $Sold

Come and Get 'em Folks! You won't find 1909 Obaks this cheap anywhere else! Fire Sale! All must go!

One more try at these rock-bottom prices before they hit eBay or get consigned somewhere. Thanks for looking!

Best,
Lee
Listening to offers on one or multiple cards!

Three cards left:

$20 each - Tennent, Hitt, and Cameron.

Please add $4 for shipping for 1-2 cards. Take all three for $55 and shipping is on me.
